data.Name: Sum 41 & Simple Plan: The Blame Canada Tour
data.Description: Based on the latest local guidelines, attendees are no longer required to provide proof of negative COVID-19 test AND/OR vaccination for entry into this event. Be sure to check your venue website for the latest updates and guidelines as entry requirements are subject to change. AGES 16+ WELCOME WITH VALID PHOTO ID. No exceptions for anyone under 16. Doors: 6PM Show: 7PM *Support acts subject to change without notice. The Fillmore Auditorium is a general admission venue.
